trans-unit.source: A factory that provides instances of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 提供的執行個體的 factory <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"> </xref>在 managed 裝載的環境主控件執行個體以回應傳入訊息中會動態建立位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XAML file that defines the workflow service or the service type.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作流程服務或服務型別之 XAML 檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: A list of addresses that serves as a reference point for other addresses.
trans-unit.target: 做為其他位址參考點的位址清單。
服務主機基底執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref> and base addresses.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>和基底地址。

trans-unit.source: A list of addresses that serves as a reference point for other addresses.
trans-unit.target: 做為其他位址參考點的位址清單。
工作流程服務主機執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowService"></xref> and base addresses.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowService"></xref>和基底地址。

trans-unit.source: The workflow service that becomes the host.
trans-unit.target: 成為主機工作流程服務。

trans-unit.source: A list of addresses that serves as a reference point for other addresses.
trans-unit.target: 做為其他位址參考點的位址清單。
工作流程服務主機執行個體。
